2:
--------------------
Text: VMF-452:  The squadron is best known for being aboard the USS Franklin (CV-13) when she was severely damaged by Japanese kamikaze planes of the coast of Okinawa on March 19, 1945.
Triplets:<VMF-452
3:
--------------------
Text: VMF-452:  VMF-452 was deactivated on December 31, 1949 and has remained in an inactive status since.
